high_descs: walk to the wall , turn right, walk to the night stand
turn on the lamp on the night stand
grab the disc on the right
anns.task_desc: turn on the lamp on the night stand, grab the disc on the right

high_descs: Go to the wall, turn right and go to nightstand between the bed and wall.
Turn on the lamp in the corner of the nightstand.
Pick up the CD on the edge of the nightstand closest to the bed.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the bedside lamp and pick up a CD.

high_descs: Go stand between the left side of the bed and the wall and face the nightstand.
Turn on the lamp sitting on the nightstand.
Pick the rightmost disc up off of the nightstand.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the disc in the light.
